root.title: dai-ichi hotel swiss franc note coupon cut
root.body: the coupon dai-ichi hotel ltd 50 mln swiss franc issu five-year note equiti warrant cut pct indic pct lead manag swiss volksbank say the warrant exercis price 1,507 yen per share compar last trade price 1,470 yen say the note guarante long-term credit bank japan ltd payment due march 25
